theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Metabolic Reprogramming Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on insulin/IGF signaling pathway modulating aging via methionine metabolism reprogramming, linking IIS to metabolic flexibility and longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Oxidative Stress Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS and MAPK pathways regulating lifespan through stress resistance and antioxidant defense mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Oxidative Stress Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes ROS scavenging and IIS pathway transcription factors DAF-16 and SKN-1 in longevity and neuroprotection.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Oxidative Stress Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links IIS pathway regulation of uric acid metabolism, ROS production, and FOXO-mediated oxidative stress mitigation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on caloric restriction extending lifespan via systemic metabolic and physiological changes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Oxidative Stress Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes DAF-16/FOXO3A-mediated stress response to oxidative DNA damage and its dysregulation accelerating aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Energy Allocation and Reproduction-Maintenance Tradeoff Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Classic disposable soma theory emphasizing resource tradeoff between reproduction and somatic maintenance driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes dietary restriction extending lifespan via conserved nutrient sensing pathways including IIS, TOR, AMPK, and sirtuins.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on caloric restriction effects on lifespan, stress reduction, and molecular pathways including IIS and sirtuins.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Oxidative Stress Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details IIS pathway regulation of aging via DAF-16 and HSF-1 transcription factors promoting stress resistance and longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Oxidative Stress Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes lifespan extension by targeted reduction of IIS receptor DAF-2, highlighting timing and tissue specificity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on dietary restriction mimetics extending lifespan via SKN-1 activation, independent of DAF-16.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Oxidative Stress Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes DAF-16-mediated stress resistance and longevity via IIS pathway, with partial ROS reduction independent of DAF-16.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Oxidative Stress Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Genome-wide RNAi screens highlight IIS components DAF-2, AGE-1, and DAF-16 as central regulators of longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Energy Allocation and Reproduction-Maintenance Tradeoff Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes disposable soma theory emphasizing energy allocation shifts between reproduction and maintenance under dietary restriction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Oxidative Stress Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on IIS cascade controlling lifespan via DAF-16 nuclear translocation and antioxidant gene expression.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Oxidative Stress Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS pathway modulation of oxidative stress defenses and lifespan extension in C. elegans.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details tissue-specific transcriptional changes induced by caloric restriction linked to mitochondrial function and metabolism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes metabolic and molecular pathways mediating caloric restriction effects on lifespan and healthspan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Oxidative Stress Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Summarizes IIS pathway genes and DAF-16 as central regulators of lifespan and dauer diapause connection.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Energy Sensing and AMPK Activation Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on S6K inhibition extending lifespan via ARGK-1-mediated AMPK activation and energy homeostasis regulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses dietary restriction as an adaptive environmental response postponing aging and improving physiological functions.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Dietary Restriction Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Reports caloric restriction effects on health and survival in rhesus monkeys, including sex differences and diet composition effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Energy Allocation and Reproduction-Maintenance Tradeoff Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores resource allocation tradeoffs shaping age-specific mortality and reproduction patterns driving senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling and Oxidative Stress Defense Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links IIS pathway activity, body size, IGF-1 levels, and aging, highlighting hormonal regulation and cellular senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Energy Sensing and AMPK Activation Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Molecular mobility theory relates cytoplasmic molecular mobility to aging rates, connecting biochemical reaction kinetics to lifespan.
